ntogramatzis-etal-2022-ellogon.title: The Ellogon Web Annotation Tool: Annotating Moral Values and Arguments
ntogramatzis-etal-2022-ellogon.author:
Ntogramatzis, Alexandros Fotios  and
Gradou, Anna  and
Petasis, Georgios  and
Kokol, Marko
ntogramatzis-etal-2022-ellogon.paperMotivationText: The large amount of data that have been available over the last decades, has led to the development of special tools for extracting information that can be utilised in various tasks. Especially the need for the creation of high quality annotated corpora, has raised the necessity of developing user-friendly tools to facilitate the annotation process.
ntogramatzis-etal-2022-ellogon.paperContributionText: The Ellogon Web Annotation Tool: a collaborative, web-based annotation tool built upon the Ellogon infrastructure offering an improved user experience and adaptability to various annotation scenarios by making good use of the latest design practices and web development frameworks.
ntogramatzis-etal-2022-ellogon.paperResultsText: No results are presented. The paper introduces the annotation tool and elaborates on its features. It also presentes two research projects that use the tool, but without results/analysis.
ntogramatzis-etal-2022-ellogon.dataOtherText: ancient Greek drama, 17th Century Scientific Revolution texts and fairy tales.
